name: Air Waggle
description:
Hi guys, this is my first game ever, made in Unity. It's just a crappy 3D game à lá "Flappy Bird" with a first-person point-of-view. Try to jump through the holes and get the highscore. Use the W and D keys to waggle through the air, left and right. The walls in front will kill you and the others will bounce and probably kill you... I tried to make it super hard, but playable.

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
